verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H6458>Hew<s%> thee <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like unto the <S%H7223>first:<s%> and I will <S%H3789>write<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> these <S%H3871>tables<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3871>tables,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou didst <S%H7665>break.<s%>

And <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H3559>ready<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and come <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> and present <S%H5324>thyself<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to me <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>

And <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee, <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H1571><s%> let any <S%H376>man<s%> be <S%H7200>seen<s%> throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2022>mount;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H1571><s%> let the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> nor <S%H1241>herds<s%> <S%H7462>feed<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H4136><s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H2022>mount.<s%>

And he <S%H6458>hewed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> like unto the <S%H7223>first;<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, and <S%H3947>took<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and <S%H3320>stood<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him <S%H8033>there,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> passed <S%H5674>by<s%> <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him, and <S%H7121>proclaimed,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H7349>merciful<s%> and <S%H2587>gracious,<s%> <S%H750>longsuffering,<s%> <S%H639><s%> and <S%H7227>abundant<s%> in <S%H2617>goodness<s%> and <S%H571>truth,<s%>

Keeping <S%H5341><s%> <S%H2617>mercy<s%> for <S%H505>thousands,<s%> <S%H5375>forgiving<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and <S%H6588>transgression<s%> and <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and that will by no means <S%H3808>clear<s%> <S%H5352><s%> <S%H5352><s%> the guilty; <S%H6485>visiting<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1121>children,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H1121>children,<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H8029>third<s%> and <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H7256>fourth<s%> generation.
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> made <S%H4116>haste,<s%> and bowed his <S%H6915>head<s%> toward the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> I have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight,<s%> O <S%H136>Lord,<s%> let my <S%H136>Lord,<s%> I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> us; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H7186>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H6203><s%> <S%H5971>people;<s%> and <S%H5545>pardon<s%> our <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> and our <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and take us for thine <S%H5157>inheritance.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant:<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H6381>marvels,<s%> such <S%H834>as<s%> have <S%H3808>not<s%> been <S%H1254>done<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> nor in <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H1471>nation:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a terrible <S%H3372>thing<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> will <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.

Observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H853>thou<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> thee this <S%H3117>day:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I drive <S%H1644>out<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> the <S%H567>Amorite,<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanite,<s%> and the <S%H2850>Hittite,<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite,<s%> and the <S%H2340>Hivite,<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%>

Take <S%H8104>heed<s%> to thyself, <S%H6435>lest<s%> thou <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H5921><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H935>goest,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> it <S%H1961>be<s%> for a <S%H4170>snare<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of thee:
But <S%H3588><s%> ye shall <S%H5422>destroy<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4196>altars,<s%> <S%H7665>break<s%> their <S%H4676>images,<s%> and cut <S%H3772>down<s%> their groves: <S%H842><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thou shalt <S%H7812>worship<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H410>god:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H7067>Jealous,<s%> is a <S%H7067>jealous<s%> God: <S%H410><s%>

Lest <S%H6435><s%> thou <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> and they go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and do <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and one <S%H7121>call<s%> thee, and thou <S%H398>eat<s%> of his <S%H4480>sacrifice;<s%> <S%H2077><s%>

And thou <S%H3947>take<s%> of their <S%H4480>daughters<s%> <S%H1323><s%> unto thy <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and <S%H853>make<s%> thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> their <S%H430>gods.<s%>
Thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> thee <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H430>gods.<s%>

<S%H853><s%> The <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> shalt thou <S%H8104>keep.<s%> <S%H7651>Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> thee, in the <S%H4150>time<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> in the <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H24>Abib<s%> thou camest <S%H3318>out<s%> from <S%H4480>Egypt.<s%> <S%H4714><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H6363>openeth<s%> the <S%H7358>matrix<s%> is mine; and <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6363>firstling<s%> among thy <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> whether <S%H7794>ox<s%> or <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> that is <S%H2145>male.<s%>

But the <S%H6363>firstling<s%> of an <S%H2543>ass<s%> thou shalt <S%H6299>redeem<s%> with a <S%H7716>lamb:<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> thou <S%H6299>redeem<s%> him <S%H3808>not,<s%> then shalt thou break his <S%H6202>neck.<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of thy <S%H1121>sons<s%> thou shalt <S%H6299>redeem.<s%> And <S%H3808>none<s%> shall <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me <S%H7387>empty.<s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> thou shalt <S%H5647>work,<s%> but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> thou shalt <S%H7673>rest:<s%> in earing <S%H2758>time<s%> and in <S%H7105>harvest<s%> thou shalt <S%H7673>rest.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H7620>weeks,<s%> of the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> of <S%H2406>wheat<s%> <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H614>ingathering<s%> at the <S%H8141>year's<s%> <S%H8622>end.<s%>

Thrice <S%H7969><s%> <S%H6471><s%> in the <S%H8141>year<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> your men <S%H2138>children<s%> <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H113>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>GOD,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> I will cast <S%H3423>out<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> thee, and <S%H7337>enlarge<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H1366>borders:<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall any <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2530>desire<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H776>land,<s%> when thou shalt go <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7200>appear<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7969>thrice<s%> <S%H6471><s%> in the <S%H8141>year.<s%>

Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7819>offer<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of my <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H2557>leaven;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of the <S%H6453>passover<s%> be <S%H3885>left<s%> unto the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

The <S%H7225>first<s%> of the <S%H1061>firstfruits<s%> of thy <S%H127>land<s%> thou shalt <S%H935>bring<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God.<s%> Thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1310>seethe<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> in his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H2461>milk.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3789>Write<s%> <S%H853>thou<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> the <S%H6310>tenor<s%> of <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> I have <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> thee and <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And he <S%H1961>was<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights;<s%> he did <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water.<s%> And he <S%H3789>wrote<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3871>tables<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> the <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H1697>commandments.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> came <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H4480>mount<s%> <S%H2022><s%> <S%H5514>Sinai<s%> with the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H5715>testimony<s%> in <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> when he came <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone<s%> while he <S%H1696>talked<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him.

And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of his <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone;<s%> and they were <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to come <S%H4480>nigh<s%> <S%H5066><s%> <S%H413><s%> him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>rulers<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him: and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> <S%H413>with<s%> them.

And <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> came <S%H5066>nigh:<s%> and he gave them in <S%H6680>commandment<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai.<s%>
And till <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H4480>speaking<s%> <S%H1696><s%> <S%H854>with<s%> them, he <S%H5414>put<s%> a <S%H4533>veil<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H6440>face.<s%>

But when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, he took the veil <S%H5493>off,<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4533><s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> he came <S%H3318>out.<s%> And he came <S%H3318>out,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> he was <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H5785>skin<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H7160>shone:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4533>veil<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> again, <S%H5704>until<s%> he went <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him.
